segments.text: Mom , happy Mother's Day ! A necklace for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a surprise ! This is the best present I've ever received .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your love and care over the years . I love you so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a dinner tonight ? My treat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I prefer to eat at home , and then we'll have more time to have a chat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Let me prepare the supper .
segments.speaker: S1
